name: Tumblr - Simple InDash Blog Appearance
description: Simple new look for the sidebar and popup blog windows. See their content, not their ugly customizations.

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.

additional_info:
